trans-unit.source: Represents an expression that raises an event.
<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDelegateInvokeExpression> can be used to represent code that invokes an event.
Invoking an event invokes all delegates that are registered with the event using the specified parameters.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDelegateInvokeExpression.TargetObject%2A> property specifies the event to invoke.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDelegateInvokeExpression.Parameters%2A> property specifies the parameters to pass to the delegates for the event.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeDelegateInvokeExpression"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeDelegateInvokeExpression"></xref> class using the specified target object.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the target object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeDelegateInvokeExpression"></xref> class using the specified target object and parameters.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the target object.
An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> objects that indicate the parameters.
Gets or sets the parameters to pass to the event handling methods attached to the event.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the parameters to pass to the event handling methods attached to the event.
Gets or sets the event to invoke.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the event to invoke.
